data.conditions: 6 AMPop on out of bed; you don't need the beauty sleep. And besides, it's time to reap the lofty rewards of a tiny little touch-up, two inches deep. Freshly softened corduroy carpeting will guide you through a nicely refurbished alpine landscape. Continue your smooth cruise or dip off-piste into the mad world of micro-powder pockets. Dramatic skies will feature bright solar beams breaking through a perforated cloud cover. Comfortable high temperatures will top out near 20 at the summit while Teton Village makes its way towards the 30-degree mark. A refreshing west-northwest breeze will blow through at 5-15 mph.

forecast.day_comments: A slight chance of snow showers after noon.  Mostly sunny, with a high near 13. Calm wind becoming west around 5 mph in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
forecast.night_comments: Partly cloudy, with a low around -6. Wind chill values as low as -20. West wind around 7 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.day_comments: Snow.  Low around 32. Wind chill values between 25 and 30. South southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Rain and snow, mainly before 4pm. The snow could be heavy at times.  High near 37. Wind chill values between 23 and 30. South southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
